title: Spring Melba
description: A classic dessert made into a cupcake, of course! Sweet peach cake topped with a layer of buttercream and sweet tart bark.

title: Triple Chocolate Torte
description: Ooey, gooey, rich, and chewy – brownie like cake topped with triple chocolate ganache.

title: Strawberry Shortcake
description: Deliciously sweet – real strawberry cake topped with fluffy strawberry buttercream.
